topic.title: Overview
topic.shortdesc: The kit allows you to operate network-based home lighting through a remote control

body.p: The kit includes a wireless smart lighting system that helps make the lighting in your home more energy efficient and easier to manage. The kit includes the following components:

dd.p: Allows you to power on, power off, and dim groups of lights on your network.
Energy-efficient network light bulbs you can install into standard light fixtures.

body.p: Electrical hazards can cause burns, shocks and electrocution (death).
